text: The Major Oak is the main Tree in Sherwood Forest. Legend said Robin Hood lived near here. It weighs an estimated 23 tons, has a waistline of 33 feet (10m), and is about 800â€“1000 years old.Major Oak, Nottinghamshire County Council Because of its age, the tree is held up by props. In June 2002, the Tree Council decided that The Major Oak was one of fifty "Great British Trees" in because of its place in the national heritage. ==References== Category:Trees Category:Geography of Nottinghamshire Category:Robin Hood
title: Major Oak
